Bisakah Sofyan Basir Jadi Bos PLN Lagi? Ini Bocoran Erick Thohir
04 Nov 2019, 07:47 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Menteri BUMN Erick Thohir/Foto: Isal Mawardi/detikcom

Jakarta - Menteri Badan Usaha Milik Negara (BUMN) Erick Thohir buka suara terkait kemungkinan Sofyan Basir kembali menjadi Direktur Utama PT PLN (Persero). Erick mengatakan hal itu tergantung keputusan tim penilai akhir (TPA) atau Presiden."Sedangkan pertanyaan mengenai apakah Pak Sofyan akan kembali memimpin PLN, hal ini tergantung kepada keputusan TPA, karena Penentuan Direksi PLN harus melalui TPA," kata Erick dalam keterangan tertulis yang diterima detikcom, Senin (4/11/2019).Soal vonis bebas, Erick mengatakan, pihaknya menghormati proses hukum yang berlangsung serta hasil persidangan."Saya sudah mendengar mengenai vonis bebas Pak Sofyan. Kita semua menghormati proses hukum juga hasil dari setiap persidangan bahwa Pak Sofyan Basyir dibebaskan dari berbagai tuduhan, dengan ini, tentunya nama Pak Sofyan terehabilitasi dengan sendirinya," kata Erick.Untuk diketahui, Sofyan Basir yang merupakan eks Direktur Utama PLN divonis bebas hari ini. Sofyan dinyatakan tidak terbukti memfasilitasi pemberian suap dari pengusaha Johanes Budisutrisno Kotjo kepada mantan anggota DPR Eni Maulani Saragih dan mantan Mensos Idrus Marham."Mengadili menyatakan terdakwa Sofyan Basir tidak terbukti secara sah dan meyakinkan sebagaimana dakwaan pertama dan kedua," kata hakim ketua Hariono saat membacakan amar putusan dalam sidang di Pengadilan Tipikor Jakarta, Jalan Bungur Besar Raya, Jakarta Pusat, Senin (4/11/2019).Simak Video "Sofyan Basyir Divonis Bebas, KPK Ajukan Banding?"[Gambas:Video 20detik](hns/hns)

Can Sofyan Basir Become Another PLN Boss? This is Erick Thohir's leak
Nov 04 2019, 07:47 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


BUMN Minister Erick Thohir / Photo: Isal Mawardi / detikcom

Jakarta - Minister of State-Owned Enterprises (BUMN) Erick Thohir opened his voice regarding the possibility of Sofyan Basir returning as Managing Director of PT PLN (Persero). Erick said it depends on the decision of the final assessment team (TPA) or the President. "While the question about whether Mr. Sofyan will return to lead PLN, this depends on the decision of the TPA, because the Determination of the PLN Board of Directors must go through the TPA," Erick said in a written statement received detikcom, Monday (11/04/2019). Regarding the free verdict, Erick said, his party respects the ongoing legal process and the results of the trial. "I have heard about the free sentence of Pak Sofyan. We all respect the legal process as well as the results of each trial that Mr. Sofyan Basyir is acquitted of various charges, with this, of course, the name of Mr. Sofyan was rehabilitated by itself, "said Erick. For your information, Sofyan Basir who is a former Director of PLN was acquitted today. Sofyan was declared unproven to facilitate bribery from businessman Johanes Budisutrisno Kotjo to former DPR member Eni Maulani Saragih and former Social Minister Idrus Marham. "Prosecuting stated that defendant Sofyan Basir was not legally and convincingly proven as the first and second indictments," said chief judge Hariono when reading out amar decision in a trial at the Jakarta Corruption Court, Jalan Bungur Besar Raya, Central Jakarta, Monday (11/04/2019).
